mapper.select: SELECT A.TO_USER_ID AS TO_USER_ID, A.FROM_USER_ID AS FROM_USER_ID, A.MSG_CONTENT AS MSG_CONTENT, A.SEND_DATE AS SEND_DATE, B.USER_NICKNAME AS USER_NICKNAME, NVL(C.FILE_NAME, '/resources/images/profile.png') AS FILE_NAME, A.STATUS FROM SEND_MSG A INNER JOIN G2_USER B ON (A.FROM_USER_ID = #{value} AND A.TO_USER_ID = B.USER_ID) OR (A.TO_USER_ID = #{value} AND A.FROM_USER_ID = B.USER_ID) LEFT JOIN USER_PROFILE_FILE C ON ((A.TO_USER_ID = #{value} AND A.FROM_USER_ID = C.USER_ID) OR (A.FROM_USER_ID = #{value} AND A.TO_USER_ID = C.USER_ID)) WHERE A.SEND_DATE = (SELECT MAX(SEND_DATE) FROM SEND_MSG D WHERE ((D.FROM_USER_ID = A.FROM_USER_ID AND D.TO_USER_ID = A.TO_USER_ID) OR (D.TO_USER_ID = A.FROM_USER_ID AND D.FROM_USER_ID = A.TO_USER_ID))) ORDER BY A.SEND_DATE DESC

SELECT A.TO_USER_ID AS TO_USER_ID, A.FROM_USER_ID AS FROM_USER_ID, A.MSG_CONTENT AS MSG_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(A.SEND_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SEND_DATE, ( SELECT USER_NICKNAME FROM G2_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{fromUserId} ) AS USER_NICKNAME, ( SELECT NVL(FILE_NAME, '/resources/images/profile.png') FROM USER_PROFILE_FILE WHERE USER_ID = #{fromUserId} ) AS FILE_NAME FROM SEND_MSG A WHERE ( (A.TO_USER_ID = #{toUserId} OR A.FROM_USER_ID = #{toUserId}) AND (A.TO_USER_ID = #{fromUserId} OR A.FROM_USER_ID = #{fromUserId}) ) ORDER BY SEND_DATE ASC
